about.hero_subtitle: For over 25 years, your trusted partner for professionally inspected premium vehicles in Grenchen and beyond.
about.story_p1: The history of Auto Voegeli AG dates back to 1973, when the current location in Grenchen was founded under the name Auto Walser. In 1992, it was taken over by Fredy Voegeli, who successfully continued the garage as an official representative of Ford and Honda and sustainably shaped the location in Grenchen.
about.story_p2: In 2019, the traditional garage was taken over by Dejan Kostadinov. With over 25 years of industry experience – including the successful establishment of Pneu Express GmbH in Solothurn – he brings new impulses and an expanded business concept. Today, Auto Voegeli AG presents itself as a modern, independent workshop in the Garage Plus network, ensuring professional care for vehicles of all brands. In addition to our wide range of used vehicles, we have strategically expanded our portfolio to include motorcycles from leading brands (Zontes, Voge, Wottan-Taro, Ariic, SWM, KOVE, LONCIN, XEV YOYO) as well as electric vehicles. With this interplay of tradition, experience and innovative spirit, we work daily for the satisfaction of our customers. Our location in Grenchen offers not only automotive expertise, but also personal consultation and partnership service – as it has always been our philosophy.
about.quality_text: All our professionally inspected vehicles are checked by certified technicians and come with comprehensive warranty.

legal.privacy_content:
Auto Vögeli AG respects your privacy and protects your personal data. We only collect the necessary information to provide you with our services. Your data is stored securely and will not be shared with third parties unless required by law or you have given explicit consent.

We use cookies and similar technologies to improve our website and provide you with a better user experience. You can change your cookie settings at any time in your browser.

If you have questions about data protection, please contact us at mail@autovoegeli.ch.
legal.terms_content:
These Terms and Conditions govern the use of our website and services. By using our website, you agree to these terms.

All vehicles are sold in the condition they are in at the time of sale. We strive to present all information as accurately as possible, but we do not guarantee the completeness or accuracy of all information.

Test drives are possible by prior appointment. The purchase contract only comes into effect through the signing of a written contract.

Swiss law applies exclusively to disputes.
